name: Percentage of adults living alone in the US and Canada- US Census Bureau & Statistics Canada
title: Percentage of adults living alone in the US and Canada- US Census Bureau & Statistics Canada
description: Data for the United States is for the share of adults aged 18 and over, while for Canada estimates are for the proportion of the population aged 15 and over who live alone.

sources.name: US Census Bureau & Statistics Canada
sources.dataPublishedBy: US Census Bureau & Tan, Galbraith, and Truong (2019), Statistics Canada
sources.additionalInfo: Data for the United States is for the share of adults aged 18 and over, while for Canada estimates are for the proportion of the population aged 15 and over who live alone.
